mapper.select: select no, adate, todaytotaluser, totaluser from todayuser order by no desc
select no, adate, todaytotaluser, totaluser from todayuser where adate = #{adate}
select no, adate, todaytotaluser, totaluser from (select * from todayuser order by no desc) where rownum = 1
